title: Reantasy, Montreal: The book to read, the place to be
description: Reantasy…Montreal remembers, reminds and recounts various recollections, events, brief histories and trivia, as seen through the eyes of and experienced by a fictional life lived mostly during the mid-to late nineteen seventies in the city of Montreal.Reantasy…Montreal is a story of innocence, personal and sexual growth and a passage from childhood to adulthood during a fondly remembered bygone Montreal era.
author: David Makin
